name: Aznar, the Sport Star
description:
Spanish former President, Mr. Jose Maria Aznar, has lost his good shape. Help him to beat the 5 sport tests to recover his mediatic phisycal conditions.

A kind of "Daley Thomson´s Decathlon", but insted of smashing the keys, you must press them in a right cadence. Being patient will make you to enjoy the game. If not, you will be dissapointed.

Instructions attached are only available in Spanish.
